label: ham
subject: I Don't Understand The Context Allocation/Destruction Code
body: The Project Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation is a non-profit 501(c)(3) educational corporation organized under the laws of the state of Mississippi and granted tax exempt status by the Internal Revenue Service.
